name: Doublezero
headline: Platform to build, use, and monetize fully autonomous agents
description:
Doublezero is a platform that provides developers with everything they need to build, operate, and monetize autonomous agents. Developers can focus on creating tools while Doublezero handles reasoning frameworks, state management, analytics, monetization, and a runner UI.

Users can interact with agents through a powerful UI that allows play, pause, rewind, and human intervention, and discover or share agents and tools through an integrated marketplace.

founders.name: Albrey Brown, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder at Ceejay. I'm really good at helping early stage start ups go to market. I built and sold my second company in 2016. Since then I've had the pleasure of working with amazing people at startups like DocuSign, and Airtable. 

Ceejay is an assistant that saves you time. Mainly by managing your email inbox. Send me an email if you'd like to use it or want to talk sales, marketing, parenting, or crossfit.

founders.name: Scott Moss, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder at Doublezero S24, Tipe W18. Prev eng @Netflix, former VC.

founders.name: Travis Ueki, Founder
founders.description:
Co-Founder of Ceejay, Previously Tipe (W18),  Coinbase (S12)

Obsessed with building product. Born and raised on Oahu, Hawaii, my journey‚Äôs been anything but conventional.

# Create tools. Ship agents.
Just write your agent's tools. Doublezero handles the rest.
Join the beta
![AI Platform Dashboard](https://doublezero.tech/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Frunner_screen_2x.e8c765bf.png&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_84DZzzSSdFnwahvGg6WS1NYzjAqV)
Build
## The whole agent stack
Your job ends at tools. Our platform does the rest: UI, metrics, orchestration, sharing, monitoring - all the infrastructure you don't want to think about.
Ready
### Observing
### Thinking
### Deciding
### Executing
Built different
Your agents run on our research-backed reasoning engine. We already solved the hard stuff.
Integrations
Create your own tools via API routes or leverage our extension library to supercharge your agents.
Intuitive controls
Run multiple agents in parallel with real-time control. Monitor and adjust behavior on the fly.
![Metrics dashboard](https://doublezero.tech/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fmetrics_cropped.c2e1f621.png&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_84DZzzSSdFnwahvGg6WS1NYzjAqV)
Metrics for days
Track performance, costs, and more with detailed insights and optimization recommendations.

Approval needed
Agent waiting for review
Human powered
Integrate human oversight with approval flows and feedback for critical decisions.
Autonomousagentsarethefuture.We'rebuildingtheplatformthey'llliveon.
Platform
## Agents deserve better
Workflow apps had their moment. We built the infrastructure autonomous agents actually need.
### Play, pause, rewind
Complete control over any agent you task with an objective.
### Correct in real time
Pause and provide feedback to course correct your agent while it's running.
### Invite your team
Share your agents with your entire team when you invite them to your organization.
### Monetize your agents
Activate monetization and make money from your agents when others use them.
### Insights for improvement
Every important metric automatically tracked and displayed in your dashboard.
### Marketplace
Get started fast by using agents and tools created by the community.
## Agents are the future, start building today.
Sign up for beta and get access.
Join the beta
FAQ
## Frequently asked questions
### Who is this for?
### Is Doublezero a framework?
No. There is no SDK or any packages to install. The only code you might need would be for any custom tools for your agents. These are just API routes, so you can use any framework and hosting provider you want.
### How does this compare to Langchain and other LLM frameworks?
### How good are the agents that are built with Doublezero?
### What can I customize about my agents?
### How does pricing work?
### How does monetization for my agents work?
### Why are you still in beta?
## Sign up for Beta
Be the first to try Doublezero and help shape the future of autonomous development.
Sign up for beta
### Contact Us
Email: founders@doublezero.tech
### Follow Us

generated_description:
Doublezero, founded in 2025 and backed by Y Combinator's Batch S24, is stepping into the exhilarating world of autonomous agents. The company‚Äôs mission is straightforward: provide developers with a comprehensive platform to build, use, and monetize these agents without getting bogged down by the underlying complexities. 

Think of it like this: if you're a developer, you can concentrate on crafting the tools your agents need, while Doublezero takes care of the heavy lifting‚Äîthink reasoning frameworks, state management, analytics, monetization, and an intuitive user interface for managing these agents. It‚Äôs designed for simplicity and power, allowing users to start, stop, rewind, and even intervene in real-time with the agents they create.

The platform's architecture is solid. It offers robust functionality: from observing and thinking to deciding and executing‚Äîessentially everything your autonomous agents need to thrive. Developers can create their own tools via API routes and leverage an extension library to enhance their agents' capabilities. Moreover, you can track everything that matters‚Äîperformance metrics, costs, insights for optimization‚Äîall in one dashboard.

Doublezero's platform also features a marketplace for tools and agents, making it quick and easy to find community-driven resources. This not only accelerates the development process but also opens up monetization pathways, allowing developers to earn from their creations.

With a compact team of just two employees and the backing of Garry Tan as their Group Partner, Doublezero is poised to capitalize on the growing demand for autonomous agents. It positions itself as a vital player in a future where these intelligent systems will likely become commonplace.

For developers eager to start building, Doublezero is currently in beta. If you're interested, you can join the waitlist on their website at [doublezero.tech](https://doublezero.tech). It's an exciting time to dive into the realm of autonomous agents‚ÄîDoublezero aims to help you do just that.
